original_text: God could decide to remove life from the world. He could take back his spirit and his breath. God could decide to remove life from the world. He could take back his spirit and his breath. God could decide to remove life from the world. He could take back his spirit and his breath. God could decide to remove life from the world.
korean_text: 그가 만일 뜻을 정하시고 그의 영과 목숨을 거두실진대

sentences.original_text: God could decide to remove life from the world
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 세상에서 생명을 제거하기로 결정하실 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: He could take back his spirit
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 자신의 영을 거두어 가실 수 있습니다
그리고 자신의 숨결도 거두어 가실 수 있습니다
